title: The War of the Roses - 1989
description:

Director: Danny DeVito
Composer: David Newman
Screenwriter: Michael Leeson (Novel: Warren Adler)

GENRE: Comedy 

The Roses, Barbara and Oliver, live happily as a married couple. Then she starts to wonder what life would be like without Oliver, and likes what she sees. Both want to stay in the house, and so they begin a campaign to force each other to leave. In the middle of the fighting is D&#039;Amato, the divorce lawyer. He gets to see how far both will go to get rid of the other, and boy do they go far..
